gonna make it count.

Well, come on. Aren't you gonna ask me why I woke you up?

as promised, our bucket list.
I have carefully planned and very intricately scheduled each item

-[man] One, two, three! -["Good Lovin'" playing]
♪ Good love, good love! ♪
♪ Good love ♪

-[man] We got a winner! -[cheering]

No! No!
-This is the best day of my life! -[laughing]

-To making… -[both] Dreams come true!

-♪ Yeah, yeah, yeah! ♪ -♪ Yeah, yeah… ♪

[both] Oh, okay.

[both] Hey!
-[growls] -[screaming]

-Hey, Elle. -Yeah.

[Elle] Yeah. No problem at all.
[Elle] Hey, that's my job.
-Dude! [chuckles] -Are you kidding? I just wanna help.

Live together at Berkeley.
[sighs] This one was gonna be tricky.
Hey, um…
I've been thinking. And what if I just went up with you now?

Hi, guys. Sorry about the wait. I--
-Elle? -Oh, my God.
-[chuckles] -Uh, hi.
-[splutters] How are you? -[chuckles]
-Oh, my God. It's so good to see you. -Elle, nice to see you.

[chuckles] Oh, gosh. Don't worry about it.
I hope things can be cool for us, since we'll probably run into each other around here.

Interesting.
Um, question…

That's why it's so funny.
Actually, um, you rushed out of the house so-- so quickly this afternoon.

Yeah. Oh, my gosh. Yeah, absolutely.
As far as I'm concerned, that is-- that's ancient history.

I ran into Marco and his family eating at the restaurant,

Wait, that's--

I didn't mean for that to come out the way that it did. I'm-- I'm really sorry.

Let's just drop it, okay?
Okay, it's dropped. [chuckles]
[Elle] Okay.
-[Noah] I'm bored. -[both laugh]

What is the bucket list item?
-It's amazing. -[chuckles] No.

translation.de: -Noah! Du übertreibst immer. -Warum trägt er es?

translation.en: He's not. There's nothing going on between Marco and me.

translation.en: If you think that he's not still after you, then you're being naive.

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
It's embarrassing.
God. I'll see you at the house.

translation.en: Hey, thank you so much again for today. It was amazing.

translation.en: Of course. Any time.
You're the best.
[Lee] Sounds like Noah was pretty upset.
You know what?
I don't even care. What we just did was legendary.
translation.de: Es ist mir egal. Was wir gerade getan haben, war legendär.

translation.en: I don't know. I sort of think he might have a point.

if Rachel started hanging out with an ex of hers all the time, you know?

translation.de: Okay. Er ist erstens nicht mein Ex, Lee.

translation.de: Und zweitens braucht es dafür zwei Leute. Das heißt, Noah vertraut mir nicht.

translation.en: It's him that I don't trust.
I mean, he clearly still has feelings for her. So…

translation.en: Look, if you trust her, then you gotta believe what she says and nothing less.
translation.de: Wenn du ihr vertraust, musst du ihr glauben, was sie sagt.

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Uh, yeah. It's just-- just stuff with my parents.
translation.de: Ja. Es geht nur um meine Eltern.

translation.en: What's going on?
It's nothing.
My dad just told me that him and my mom are getting a divorce,

translation.en: and now they won't stop calling to check up on me.
translation.de: sie fragen jetzt ständig, wie es mir geht.

translation.en: -Oh, I'm sorry. -No, please.
Just don't make a big deal about it, okay?
translation.de: Mach keine große Sache daraus. Okay?

translation.en: [sighs] Eight ball, corner pocket.
-Third time's the charm. -Third time.
It's always the third time. What's that about? What is that?
translation.de: -Immer beim dritten Mal. Was soll das? -Was ist das?

translation.en: [Lee] What? Wait a minute.
What?
No way.
I cannot believe they're getting rid of our DDM machine.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass sie die DDM-Maschine abschaffen.

translation.en: Wait. The DDM machine.
What are you doing?
I'm adding a final item to our list.

translation.en: The last DDM dance on our machine.

translation.en: July 5th. You'll be there, right?

translation.de: Lag es am Streit mit Noah,

translation.de: oder daran, dass alle gleichzeitig etwas wollten,

translation.en: but I was starting to feel overwhelmed.
translation.de: aber ich fing an, mich überfordert zu fühlen.

translation.en: -What? You don't wanna do it? -Of course I wanna do it.
translation.de: Was? Du willst das nicht tun? Natürlich will ich das tun.

translation.en: But we literally have one month left to finish the entire bucket list,
translation.de: Aber es bleibt nur ein Monat, um die Liste zu beenden,

translation.en: and then we leave for school.
translation.de: und dann gehen wir zur Uni.

translation.en: Yeah.
I get it.
You got your hands full. It's okay.
translation.de: Du hast zu viel zu tun. Schon gut.

translation.en: -[Elle] But just like Lee… -[sighs]
Lee, hold on please.
I'll be there.
…I wasn't ready to let go yet either.
Okay. Thanks.
And we're still on for tonight? All right, we put a lot of work in it.

translation.en: -So we can't be late. -Yeah, no, don't worry. I won't be late.
translation.de: Klappt heute Abend? Das war viel Arbeit. Wir müssen pünktlich sein. Keine Sorge. Ich bin pünktlich.

translation.en: Noah, you did all of this?

translation.en: I wanted to make up for yesterday.
This looks amazing.
I thought you could use a night in. You deserve it.

Well, there's this…
God. I have this thing with Lee, and it's like we've been planning it for weeks--

translation.en: Please don't tell me it's a bucket list thing.

You're actually gonna go? I mean, I made you dinner.

translation.en: -I did this for you, and you're leaving? -No, it's not like I wanna go.

translation.en: Listen, we're gonna be in Boston together all next year. I just feel like I'm leaving him all alone.
translation.de: Wir sind nächstes Jahr zusammen in Boston. Es ist, als lasse ich ihn allein.

translation.en: Me asking you to come to Boston
isn't some, like, evil plot to make you leave Lee behind.
translation.de: war kein böser Plan, damit du Lee zurücklässt.

translation.en: No, I-- I'm not-- That's not what I'm saying at all.

translation.en: Listen, I'm gonna be back in an hour, okay? I swear.

translation.en: Fine. Do whatever you want.
Noah. I-- [sighs]
Please.
I'm sorry. I…
[Lee] Hey, you okay?
[Elle] Yeah, of course.
-[Rachel] Mm-hmm. -Sure.
-Yeah! -Yeah!
Oh, my God!
-That was crazy, right? -[woman] That was crazy!
[Elle] The truth was, I was doing the bucket list to soften the blow to Lee
translation.de: In Wahrheit machte ich die Bucketlist, um den Schlag für Lee zu mildern,

translation.de: damit es leichter fiel, mit Noah nach Boston zu gehen.

translation.de: …fühlte sich an, als wäre ich einen Schritt weiter weg von ihm.

Hey, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! What are you doing? I'm painting the trim.
translation.de: -Hey. Wow. Was machst du da? -Ich streiche die Verkleidung.

translation.en: Okay, well, you can paint everything else in this house, just not this doorway.
translation.de: Du kann in diesem Haus alles streichen, nur nicht diesen Durchgang.

translation.en: Well, Mom told me to do it, so…
I don't care what Mom said. You're not painting this doorway.

translation.en: -Stop being a jerk, man. Just move. -I'm not moving!
translation.de: -Sei kein Idiot. Geh einfach. -Ich gehe nicht weg.

translation.en: Fine.
You're gonna have to sleep at some point.
Brad!
-Brad? -[Brad] Yeah.
Thank God.
Where were you, dude? I couldn't find you anywhere.

translation.en: I'm right here.
Well, yeah, but I was supposed to come get you.
translation.de: Ja. Aber ich sollte dich abholen.

translation.en: What?
No, no, I'm here because I was supposed to get Brad, and I couldn't find him.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, weil ich Brad holen sollte und ihn nicht finden konnte.

translation.en: Oh, Elle, I'm so sorry.
Your dad told me how busy you were, and I offered to pick up Brad.

translation.en: Oh, didn't he text you? No, he didn't. [huffs]
translation.de: -Hat er nichts geschrieben? -Nein. Hat er nicht.

translation.en: What I would like, though, is for you to contact me directly
translation.de: Aber ich hätte gerne, dass du mich direkt kontaktierst,

translation.en: if plans change.
I really am sorry.
But with you working and grocery shopping and watching Brad,

translation.en: I just felt like you might need a hand.
translation.de: dachte ich, du könntest Hilfe gebrauchen.

translation.en: Well, you were wrong.
We've been taking care of ourselves quite fine for a while now.

translation.en: Milk was bought.
-[groans, gulps] -Are you okay?
[Elle] Just not this week.
-Can I do anything? -Mnh-mnh.
[gulps] Nope. I got it covered.

translation.en: How much longer on table 25?
[man] Just hold your horses.
-[shoes squeak] -Whoa! [grunts]
-[clattering] -Son of a bitch!
Hey, you are working.
You-- you doing okay?
Not really. [sighs]
I still don't understand why you guys ended up fighting.
translation.de: Ich verstehe immer noch nicht, wieso ihr gestritten habt.

translation.en: I guess once we moved in together, everything kind of fell apart.
translation.de: Nachdem wir zusammengezogen sind, ist alles auseinandergefallen.

translation.en: Wait. So what, you're just gonna give up?
I'm not giving up.
I'm just tired of fighting.
Well, then do something about it.
Like talk to her or fight for her. Anything. God!

translation.en: [Elle sobbing] Between my family and the job,
and just trying to make it up to Lee after lying about Berkeley,
translation.de: und dem Versuch, die Lüge über Berkeley bei Lee wiedergutzumachen,

translation.en: [sniffles] I just feel like I'm running around like a crazy person.
translation.de: fühle ich mich, als würde ich wie eine Verrückte herumlaufen.

translation.en: As far as living with Noah in Boston goes--
translation.de: Und was das Leben mit Noah in Boston angeht…

translation.en: [sighs, chuckles] Oh, gosh. How much time you got?

translation.en: -As much time as you need. -[chuckles]
You're really sweet.
[Noah] Hey, what's wrong?
Just go away.
No, I'm not going anywhere. What's going on?
translation.de: Nein. Ich gehe nirgendwo hin. Was ist los?

translation.en: [sighs] It's my parents. They just--
translation.de: Es geht um meine Eltern. Sie…

translation.en: They don't even wanna try and patch things up.
translation.de: Sie versuchen nicht mal, es zu retten.

translation.en: They just want out.
You know,
you see all the problems, and you hear all the fights,
translation.de: du siehst die Probleme und hörst die Streitereien,

translation.en: but you still think they're gonna find a way to figure it out.
translation.de: aber du hoffst doch, dass sie eine Lösung finden.

translation.en: Listen, why don't I come back at the end of your shift?

translation.en: We can keep talking.
-Really? -Sure. [chuckles]
Okay, yeah. [chuckles]
That'd be kinda nice.
[Chloe] Look at me.
I'm a 23-year-old woman, and I'm crying because Mommy and Daddy are breaking up.
translation.de: Ich bin eine 23-jährige Frau und weine, weil Mama und Papa sich trennen.

translation.en: -Stop. -[sighs]
God, I feel so pathetic right now. [sniffles]

translation.en: You don't have to do that.
Not with me.
Should probably get back to work. [chuckles]
Thank you.
Come here.
I'll see you later.
Sorry. We're closed.
Hello?
May I have this dance?
Noah Flynn wants to dance?
Yeah, just this one time.
I don't like fighting.
translation.de: Ich mag es nicht, zu streiten.

translation.en: Me either.
But I'll fight for you.
I'll fight for you too.
Hey, dude. Could you, like, not mess up that room? I just cleaned it.

translation.en: Your mom has buyers coming in, like, 30 minutes. -What have you been doing all morning? -[explosions]

translation.en: You're doing it wrong. Here, gimme.

translation.en: I'm not. I'm just taking care of it like we promised.

translation.en: -Boom! There you go. -Whatever. Traitor.
So what time do you wanna leave for, uh, Berkeley next week?

translation.en: -Oh. Oh, man. -Elle…
I know. I know. I know. I know, but listen.

translation.en: Noah and I, like, literally just made up.
translation.de: Aber Noah und ich haben uns gerade versöhnt.

translation.en: And things have been kinda off lately, so… [sighs] I feel like I should stick around.

translation.en: Sure.
-It's fine. -Thank you.
That afternoon,
I couldn't stop thinking about what I knew I needed to do.

translation.en: -Hi. -[Elle] Hey, Marco, um…
I just wanted to call, and-- and, um…
say sorry about last night.
Uh, Noah came by, and we, uh, sorted things out.

translation.en: Uh, that's-- that's great.
Yeah.
But thank you so much for being there for me.

translation.en: I mean, that really meant a lot.
Yeah, of course.
And if you ever wanna talk or need anything,

translation.en: you know, just call me.
Day or night. I mean it.

translation.en: Thank you.
Um, I'll let you get back to work.
Uh, take care.
All right, bye.
Hey, Tuppen. What's up, dude?
Great.
So what are you doing for the Fourth of July?

She had an acceptance letter to Berkeley.

translation.en: Which means that she was never on the wait-list.

translation.en: -Wow! -I guess she found out, like, in May.

translation.en: Well, I guess that that does show how much she wants to be with you in Boston.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I guess.

translation.en: These are for the concert on the 22nd.

translation.en: We're both in college orientation then.
Yeah, I figure we could skip orientation so that we could spend more time together.

-Happy Fourth of July, Ellen! -[Elle] How are you?
Welcome to the party.
Oh, Randy! Okay, bye, Elle.
-[Olivia] I'll see you later. -Bye.
[Gwyneth] Hello, Randy!
-Hey, I hope it's okay I'm here. -Um…

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, of course. Hi.
-There's, you know, food and drinks… -I can't believe that Marco showed up.

-So, have fun. -[Marco] Cool.
-Thanks. -[Elle] Yeah.

[man] Let's go!
All right. Whoo!
MVP, baby!
-[man] Let's go! -[man 2] Match point. All tied up.
-Good game, dude. -Good game.
-That's great. [cackles] -Yeah!
Hey, close one.
Yeah. Nice shot, asshole.
You know, you shouldn't be a sore loser.
And I'd appreciate it if you watched your mouth.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just trying to have a good time. You're the one trying to hurt somebody.

translation.en: Hmm. And what are you trying to do?
Look, this little innocent friend thing you got going on,

translation.en: nobody's buying it.
-It's very clear what you're here for. -Really? What is that?
translation.de: -Es ist klar, was du willst. -Wirklich? Was ist das?

translation.en: You still want Elle.
-You shut up. -Guys, can you please stop this?
You still want Elle, and everybody here knows that.
translation.de: Du willst immer noch Elle, und das weiß hier jeder.

translation.en: Yo, I said shut up.
The sooner you get that through your thick skull, the sooner you--

translation.en: -[crowd gasping] -Noah!
translation.de: Je schneller du das kapierst, desto schneller kannst… Noah!

translation.en: I'm not doing this.
You okay?
[Elle] Noah!
Noah! Noah!
Noah, please… [panting]
Will you please say something?
I asked you not to let him back in our lives.

translation.en: Wait, Noah!
Noah, wait. [sobs]
Elle! I am so sorry.
translation.de: Elle! Es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: -I cannot believe that you just did that. -He-- he was pushing me.
translation.de: -Unfassbar, dass du das getan hast. -Er hat mich provoziert.

translation.en: -I didn't know what to do. -I don't care!
You just-- you seriously-- you need to not be here right now.
translation.de: Du… Du kannst jetzt nicht hier sein.

translation.en: You just need to go.
Look, Noah was right.
And you know he was.
Look, I know I've messed up a lot,

translation.en: but it doesn't change how I feel about you.
translation.de: aber das ändert nichts an meinen Gefühlen für dich.

translation.en: And I know you're not meant to be with that guy.
translation.de: Und du bist nicht für ihn bestimmt.

translation.en: -No. -Please just give me a chance and I'll--
translation.de: -Nein. -Bitte gib mir eine Chance und ich…

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it! Stop!
[sobs] You need to go. Please.
-Look what I found. [chuckles] -[Brad] Oh, Monopoly!
-[Brad] The game… -[Linda] …is on!
[Mr. Evans] Okay. Brad, you do the honors.
translation.de: Okay. Brad, du hast die Ehre.

translation.en: Is that your favorite game, Brad?
-[Brad] It is my favorite. -Oh, wow! Yes!
-[Brad] I'm gonna set up these pieces. -[Linda] This one's for you.
-He's very particular. -[laughing]
Oh, and I call the race car.
Oh, no, no, no, no. Hang on. We have to roll to pick our pieces.

translation.en: -[Mr. Evans] Play by the rules! -[Brad] Okay.
translation.de: Nein. Moment mal. Wir müssen um die Figuren würfeln. -Spiel nach den Regeln. -Sie meint es ernst.

translation.en: [chuckles] She's serious.
translation.de: -Spiel nach den Regeln. -Sie meint es ernst.

translation.en: All right, I got this. I got this.
-Yes! -Oh!
I get to choose. Whoo!
And I will choose the doggy.
Oh, no, no, actually-- sorry. I'm-- I'm always the Scottie.
translation.de: Nein. Eigentlich… Tut mir leid. Ich bin immer Scottie.

translation.en: Come on, Elle. I rolled first.
translation.de: Komm schon, Elle. Ich bin die Erste.

translation.en: -Come on, Elle. Come on. -I get the doggy. Right is right.
translation.de: -Komm schon, Elle. -Ich bekomme den Hund. Das ist nur fair.

translation.en: It doesn't matter. [chuckles]
Come on, Elle. Give her the piece.

translation.en: Oh, no, hang on. You have it. I want you to have it. Here.

translation.en: I don't really care what you want.

translation.en: -Elle! -What?
translation.de: Elle! Was? Es tut mir leid, Dad. Ich…

translation.de: Was? Es tut mir leid, Dad. Ich…

translation.de: Sie kann nicht in unser Leben treten und Teil davon sein,

No matter how hard you're trying to.

translation.en: [Mr. Evans] Elle!
What was all that?
I'm sorry, but I cannot stand her.

translation.en: The way that she's trying to force herself into our lives.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -She's not Mom.
She never will be.
And I just think it's selfish of you to even be doing it.

I've spent the last six years of my life making sure that you and Brad are my only priority.
translation.de: In den letzten sechs Jahren meines Lebens waren du und Brad meine Priorität.

translation.en: I put that part of my life on hold.

-Dad, I didn't realize-- Dad, I had no-- -No, Elle. No.
translation.de: -Dad, mir war nicht klar… Dad, ich… -Nein, Elle. Nein.

translation.en: You have no idea how disappointed in you I am right now.
translation.de: Du weißt gar nicht, wie enttäuscht ich gerade bin.

translation.en: There's, uh, two things in life that are worth spending a little extra on.
translation.de: Es gibt zwei Sachen im Leben, die es wert sind, mehr dafür zu bezahlen.

What's the other one?
Bacon. Obviously.
I really messed up yesterday.
Your dad will forgive you.
And Noah will come back. He always does.
translation.de: Und Noah wird zurückkommen. Das tut er immer.

translation.en: Yeah.
-Thanks for helping me clean up. -Of course.
Rule number three.
[Elle] Rule number three is a good one.
Always help clean up your bestie's messes.

translation.en: Um, are we still good for the arcade later?
Yeah.
I'm glad you remembered.
